related_post.text: I am trying to improve tesseract chances of recognizing textI have seen this thread: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/57210342/improvingpytesseractcorrecttextrecognitionfromimagehe applied a threshold of 220 but it will not work on darker image (it will just black it all)what should I do?
